title: Fraud Detection Tools
subtitle: A suite of tools to help you detect and avoid financial fraud.
deepfakeDetector.title: Deepfake Detector
deepfakeDetector.description: Analyze videos to detect deepfakes and manipulated media.
socialMonitor.title: Social Media Monitor
socialMonitor.description: Monitor social media for pump & dump schemes and other financial scams.
advisorVerifier.title: Advisor Verifier
advisorVerifier.description: Verify if your financial advisor is registered with SEBI.
